description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国东南沿海省份
description.en: A province on the southeastern coast of China

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任福建省委书记、福建省人大常委会主任
description.en: Chinese politician, current Party Secretary and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of Fujian

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任福建省省长
description.en: Chinese politician, current Governor of Fujian

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任福建省政协主席
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 战国时期越国君主
description.en: Monarch of the state of Yue during the Warring States period

description.zh-cn: 周朝诸侯国
description.en: A vassal state of the Zhou dynasty

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国皇帝
description.en: Founding emperor of the Han dynasty

description.zh-cn: 闽越国第一任君主
description.en: The first king of Minyue Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 汉朝第七位皇帝
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Han dynasty

description.zh-cn: 闽越国宗室、繇王
description.en: A member of the Minyue royal family, King Yao

description.zh-cn: 闽越国末代君主，自称武帝
description.en: The last ruler of Minyue Kingdom, self-proclaimed Emperor Wu

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝
description.en: Emperor of the Tang dynasty

description.zh-cn: 唐朝设立的军区长官职称，其设立始出现“福建”之名
五代十国时期闽国建立者
description.en: Founder of the Min Kingdom during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period

description.zh-cn: 宋朝的行政区划
description.en: An administrative division of the Song dynasty

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty

description.zh-cn: 福建省省会
description.en: Capital of Fujian Province

description.zh-cn: 福建省下辖的地级市，副省级市
description.en: A prefecture-level city and sub-provincial city in Fujian Province

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，洋务运动的代表人物
description.en: An influential statesman of the late Qing dynasty and a leading figure in the Self-Strengthening Movement

description.zh-cn: 晚清洋务运动时期创办的近代军事工业
description.en: A modern military industry founded during the Self-Strengthening Movement in the late Qing dynasty

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十九路军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十九路军

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军的一支部队
description.en: A military formation of the Republic of China's National Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 1933年“闽变”期间由国民革命军第十九路军在福建建立的政权
description.en: A regime established in Fujian by the 19th Route Army during the Fujian Rebellion in 1933

description.zh-cn: 连接江西鹰潭和福建厦门的铁路线
description.en: A railway line connecting Yingtan in Jiangxi and Xiamen in Fujian

description.zh-cn: 担任福建省委员会书记
description.en: Serves as the Secretary of the Fujian Provincial Committee

position.en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 担任福建省人民代表大会常务委员会主任
description.en: Serves as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Fujian Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 担任福建省省长
description.en: Serves as the Governor of Fujian Province

position.en: Chairman of the Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 担任中国人民政治协商会议福建省委员会主席
description.en: Serves as the Chairman of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 公元前306年，越王无彊被楚国杀死。
description.en: In 306 BC, King Wuqiang of Yue was killed by the state of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝在福建设置闽中郡，是第一个在福建设立行政机构的中原王朝。
description.en: The Qin dynasty established the Minzhong Commandery in Fujian, being the first Central Plains dynasty to set up an administrative body in Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 汉高帝五年（前202年），刘邦封无诸为闽越王。
description.en: In the fifth year of Emperor Gaozu of Han (202 BC), Liu Bang enfeoffed Wuzhu as the King of Minyue.

description.zh-cn: 汉高帝封无诸为闽越王，闽越国为汉朝的藩属国。
description.en: Emperor Gaozu of Han enfeoffed Wuzhu as the King of Minyue, and the Minyue Kingdom became a vassal state of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝元封元年（前110年），派遣大军攻入闽越国，导致其灭亡。
description.en: In the first year of Yuanfeng of Emperor Wu of Han (110 BC), a large army was sent to invade the Minyue Kingdom, leading to its demise.

description.zh-cn: 杀东越王余善以降汉。
description.en: Killed King Yushan of Dongyue and surrendered to Han.

description.zh-cn: 开元二十一年（733年），设福建经略使，始出现“福建”之名。
description.en: In the 21st year of Kaiyuan (733), the office of Fujian Jielushi was established, and the name 'Fujian' first appeared.

description.zh-cn: 闽国后来为南唐所灭。
description.en: The Min Kingdom was later conquered by the Southern Tang.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝置福建路，统辖六州二军。
description.en: The Song dynasty established the Fujian Circuit, which administered six prefectures and two armies.

description.zh-cn: 康熙二十二年（1683年）台湾并入福建省版图为台厦道。
description.en: In the 22nd year of the Kangxi Emperor's reign (1683), Taiwan was incorporated into the territory of Fujian Province as the Taiwan-Xiamen Circuit.

description.zh-cn: 将福州辟为通商口岸，向外国商人开放。
description.en: Opened Fuzhou as a treaty port to foreign merchants.

description.zh-cn: 将厦门辟为通商口岸，向外国商人开放。
description.en: Opened Xiamen as a treaty port to foreign merchants.

description.zh-cn: 在洋务运动中开办福州船政局。
description.en: Established the Fuzhou Arsenal during the Self-Strengthening Movement.

description.zh-cn: 成为近代中国海军的摇篮。
description.en: Became the cradle of the modern Chinese Navy.

relationships.source: 国民革命军第十九路军

description.zh-cn: 发动“闽变”，在福建建立中华共和国。
description.en: Launched the 'Fujian Rebellion' and established the Chinese Republic in Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 建成后促进了福建的经济发展以及与中国其他地区的联系。
description.en: Its completion in 1956 promoted Fujian's economic development and its connection with other parts of China.

description.zh-cn: 对福建省大部分地区进行实质管辖。
description.en: Exercises de facto control over most of Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 对福建省部分地区（金门、马祖）进行实质管辖。
description.en: Exercises de facto control over parts of Fujian Province (Kinmen, Matsu).
